snippet: The deaths of Jose Leonardo Coj Cumar, 32, and Marcos Antonio Castro Estrada, 29, have raised questions about a state police agency policy that allows officers to fire upon vehicles during pursuits.
abstract: Deaths of two illegal immigrants in La Joya, Tex, after state police agents shot at vehicle in attempt to stop it, are raising questions about policy that allows officers to fire upon vehicles during pursuits.
lead_paragraph: The deaths of Jose Leonardo Coj Cumar, 32, and Marcos Antonio Castro Estrada, 29, have raised questions about a state police agency policy that allows officers to fire upon vehicles during pursuits.

headline.seo: Outrage in Texas After Airborne Police Sharpshooter Kills 2 Immigrants
headline.main: Outrage in Texas After Airborne Police Sharpshooter Kills 2
headline.print_headline: Outrage in Texas After Airborne Police Sharpshooter Kills 2
